name: Moon Studios
detail:
Moon Studios is an independent, distributed Games Studio founded by former AAA developers.

This unique group is a collaboration between game developers located all over the world.  We came together to follow a simple vision:
We make games we’d love to play.
And we hope you will, too!

In 2010, we officially teased our first project codenamed ‘WARSOUP’, a Realtime-Strategy-First Person Shooter.

Shortly after, in 2011, Moon Studios started development on their second title  in cooperation with Microsoft Games Studios.
In 2014, we officially teased our second project titled ‘Ori and the Blind Forest’, a 2D Metroidvania game with a strong focus on platforming, story and atmosphere.

Ori and the Blind Forest will be the first title released by Moon Studios in Early 2015 on Xbox One and PC later that year on Xbox 360.
